Description: Hello everyone! If you buy it now, you will receive this in stock and ready to ship beautiful hand painted and clear coated made in USA Gibson Fool SG. Great sounding guitar and looks fantastic. There are other Fool versions being sold for $6000 which is fair considering all the work that goes into one of these (weeks of painting). This is a guitar to be treasured for a long time. Check out Burgerguitars for other cool hand painted guitars (classic and original) I have done custom work for Broadway and Vegas shows, museums, collectors, and famous musicians, so drop a line if there's something special you want and I'll make it happen! Highly Recommended! Great paint job and the guitar plays equally as good!
